title: Love You To My End - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Cold Love Interests   Death of Loved Ones   Divorce   Hated Protagonist   Lovers Reunited   Marriage   Near-Death Experience   Obsessive Love   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Weak to Strong
author: 瑤小白
description:
Ann was devoted to Roger, but only received his bitter hatred. He married her to take revenge for his beloved woman.
She tried everything to win his heart again. Did she succeed?>
